modName: Nahkriin HQ overhaul 1k texture dragonpriest mask
summary: Complete overhaull of the Nahkriin mask.
descriptionHtml:
Now uploaded my Volsung overhaul: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5934

As many might agree I found that the dragonpriest masks were just to plain and simple, thats why I made this mod. I only did the Nahkriin because that\'s the one I wear.

Installation is simple:

Paste the folder into your existing game folder: Skyrim/steamapps/common/skyrim/

I also added a darkened hood texture that is nothing than darkened to match just a little more, expect this to be editted into a good looking and more colour matching hood!

FYI: the dragonspeech symbols say: spirit champion

enjoy
author: Remcees
